intro.descrizioneSopra: This paragraph should include an introductory description inviting users to learn more about Celyon as a company. It will highlight the company’s mission, objectives, and opportunities within this industrial sector.
intro.descrizioneSotto: This paragraph should include a brief description that further explores the company’s core business, creating curiosity and encouraging users to scroll.

prodotti.title:
What enables us to
<0>continually grow
prodotti.subtitle: A brief description introducing the company philosophy and the focus areas where Celyon makes a difference. What characterizes this company.

1.title: No outsourcing
1.desc: Our systems are designed, developed, and assembled here by us, using local, high-quality labor and materials. This allows us to maintain a high level of control.

2.title: Investment in training
2.desc: Close ties with the Universities of Pisa and Florence allow us to connect with interns, graduates, and apprentices, a valuable resource for continued growth.

3.title: Trust-based relationships with partners and suppliers
3.desc: We collaborate with reliable, precise, and punctual companies and professionals. This is the result of relationships built over years, project by project.

4.title: Environmental protection
4.desc: The products we create for our clients, especially those for maintenance and cleaning, are designed with a waste-reduction mindset.
